subject: test a GNU framework
msgSnippet: Is there a general approach to testing a library? I m trying to fork a GNU library, gnumail-providers.jar, and want to test it as I go.  Just read the manual
messageBody:
Is there a general approach to testing a library?

I'm trying to fork a GNU library, gnumail-providers.jar, and want to test it as I go. Just read the manual on JUnit?


thanks,

Thufir
